textAfterTable: Exercises Exercise Description Hear and Spell Listen to the word and then spell it. Only words with audio will be used for Hear and Spell. 1 Missing Letter Spell the word correctly by adding one letter. 2 Missing Letters Spell the word correctly by adding two letters. Spell the Word Spell the word correctly. Guess the Letters Find the word by guessing letters. Traded Letters Spell the word correctly by trading two letters. Scrambled Letters Spell the word correctly by unscrambling the letters. Added Letter Spell the word correctly by removing one letter. Compare Compare alphabetical order postions of two words. Order Put the words in alphabetical order. More AAASpelling Lists Interactive Alphabet Lessons
